pageProduct.name: Polident Whitening Denture Cleanser 108 Tablets
pageProduct.description:
General Information

Polident Whitening Daily Cleanser for Dentures helps stop stain build up (when used regularly as directed). Removes (when used regularly as directed) 99.9% of odour causing bacteria (in laboratory tests). Same product, new tablet colour.

Dentures need special care.
Polident 4 in 1 Cleaning System is the answer.
Polident 4 in 1 Cleaning System contains 4 cleaning agents that act together to keep your denture as clean as possible. It removes (when used regularly as directed) 99.9% of odour causing bacteria(in laboratory tests) and helps remove plaque & stains for a fresher & cleaner denture. Use Polident for every day confidence. 

4 in 1 Cleaning System
- Antibacterial agent.
- Detergent.
- Active oxygen accelerator.
- Stain remover.

Have you ever tried Polident Denture Adhesive Cream? It holds your dentures securely all day, and helps keep out irritating food particles. Use Polident Daily Cleanser and Polident Denture Adhesive Cream daily to enhance your denture wearing experience.

Recommended By: Endorsed by the Australian Dental Prosthetists Association

Boxed Contents: 108 Tablets

Size: 108 Tablets

Warnings

- Do not place tablet or solution in mouth
- Do not drink cleansing solution or use it as a mouthwash

CAUTION

- Keep tablets out of reach of children & those who are at risk of accidentally swallowing the tablet or solution.
- Do not touch mouth or eyes after handling tablets or solution.
Wash hands thoroughly after handling tablet or solution.

FIRST AID INFORMATION

If in eyes: Rinse cautiously with water for several minutes. Remove contact lenses, if present and easy to do. Continue rinsing. If eye irritation persists: Get medical advice/attention. Harmful if swallowed.

If swallowed: Call the Poisons Information Centre. Australia: 13 11 26; New Zealand: 0800 764 766 or doctor/physician. May produce allergic reaction. May produce allergic reaction. If irritation occurs: Discontinue use and get medical advice/attention.

Ingredients

Sodium Bicarbonate, Citric Acid, Potassium Monopersulfate, Sodium Carbonate Peroxide, Sodium Carbonate, TAED, Sodium Benzoate, PEG-180, Sodium Lauryl Sulfate, Flavour, VP/VA Copolymer, Cellulose Gum, CI 42090, CI 73015.

Directions

1. Drop one Polident Daily Cleanser tablet into enough very warm (not hot) water to cover denture.
2. After soaking for 15 minutes, or overnight if you prefer, brush denture with the solution using a soft denture brush.
3. Rinse denture thoroughly with running water. Discard solution immediately after use.

USAGE ADVICE

Do not use: if you are sensitive to any of the ingredients.
Causes serious eye irritation.

STORAGE INSTRUCTIONS

Store below 30°C

Storage Temperature: Below 30°C.
